entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
